item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 15, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Starbucks’ new chief awarded $113mn pay deal and remote office in Newport Beach
2. Columbia president resigns after pressure over student Gaza protests
3. English council claims Dubai-based businessman misused £150mn
4. Harris spends 10 times as much as Trump on digital ad blitz
5. Ukraine launches war’s ‘largest’ drone attack on Russian airfields
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 15, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
